message: I propose we split the $10,000 with an 80/20 ratio in favor of Alice, given the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split, considering the decreasing value of money. This is a fair compromise.
Considering the inflation and Bob's previous offer, I propose a 75/25 split. This maintains a reasonable advantage for me while acknowledging the diminishing value of money.
I propose a 45/55 split, taking into account the increased disadvantage of Alice's decreasing gains due to inflation. This is a more balanced compromise.
